title: Abilene Paradox (TEFC)
creator_credit: Peter Jordon, Janice M Reynolds and CRM Productions
brief_description: Deals with the management of agreement in organisations. Illustrates that mismanaged agreement is as dangerous to organisational effectiveness as excessive conflict because it can lead to inappropriate goals.
